title: Peter Gabriel Live In Verona 2014 - Taking The Pulse - 1080p AC3
description:
[b][size=200]Peter Gabriel Live In Verona - Taking The Pulse[/size][/b]


Recorded Live June 1, 2014 in the 2,000 year-old amphitheater Arena di Verona, Italy

Peter Gabriel is backed by a 50-piece symphonic orchestra and accompanied by female vocalists. The music is powerful and melodic, and intimately nostalgic. It is based on the concept that we all learn the primal rhythm of the universe from first listening to our mother's heartbeat while in the womb. And so, when this rhythm is played in music it is instantly recognizable. It makes us feel safe and secure.

The concert was digital captured from cable in HDTV. Unfortunately there are some broadcaster promos and logos in the corners of the screen. But all of the commercials and station breaks have been edited out. The audio is fantastic.

Video:_____AVC H.264 @ 8000Kbps 1920x1080 29.97fps
Audio:_____AC-3 @ 640Kbps 6-channel Dolby 5.1 48KHz 16bits
Duration:__1hr 37min
